original_text: Then he numbered the young men of the princes of the provinces, and they were two hundred and thirty two: and after them he numbered all the people, even all the children of Israel, being seven thousand.
korean_text: 아합이 이에 각 지방 고관의 청년들을 계수하니 이백삼십이 명이요 그 외에 모든 백성 곧 이스라엘의 모든 자손을 계수하니 칠천 명이더라

sentences.original_text: Then he numbered the young men
of the princes of the provinces
and they were two hundred and thirty two
and after them he numbered all the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 모든 백성을 헤아렸다

sentences.original_text: even all the children of Israel
